title: Custom Tile Backsplash, Hard surface flooring throughout, BBQ Grill
posting_body: ['*$500 Look-and-Lease*', 'NOW OPEN FOR TOURING!', 'Discover the Downtown district that made the City of Angels an international icon.', 'Between trendy eateries, yoga studios and timeless attractions such as The Broadway theatres, this brand-new community blends upscale and tech-driven amenities with a location that captures the grit and urban authenticity of downtown Los Angeles.', 'Experience the Historic Core’s eclectic vibes while savoring the modern luxuries of your home at Topaz.', 'Layouts range from studios to three bedroom homes, each boasting a smooth flow and premium interiors.', 'Tech-savvy residents love the forward-thinking features like NEST thermostats and keyless entry via your mobile device.', 'Whether you choose a single-level flat or one with a dual-level mezzanine, cosmopolitan features like quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and light-colored cabinets showcase the striking appeal.', 'The sleek design created by clean architectural lines is complemented by hardwood-style floors and recessed lighting.', 'Walk-in closets and washer and dryer hookups are included in all homes.', 'Select models give you the option to enjoy a pool or mesmerizing Downtown views from your private balcony.', 'As for amenities, you can soak up some California’s best rays by the pool, sip espresso on the courtyard deck or catch a light show on the huge LED screen in the contemporary courtyard.', 'Walk to nearby restaurants, including, Terroni, Cole’s and KazuNori.', 'Topaz is also close to Whole Foods, the Fashion Districts, Metro Bikes and Station, U.S. 101 and I-110.', 'With a location this good, you’ll only move once.', 'Find urban living you will love at Topaz today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 35', 'OR Text', '35', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1326 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fiber Ready', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Keyless Entry System', '- In Home GE Washer and Dryer', '- NEST Thermostats', '- Patios/Balconies in select units', '- Designer Lighting Package', '- High End Finishes', '- Hard surface flooring throughout', '- Custom Tile Backsplash', 'Community Amenities', '- Electric Vehicle charging stations', '- Bike Storage and Repair Station', '- 24/7 Package Pickup', '- Boosted Cellular signal', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- Chill in our Clubhouse Adjacent to the Pool', '- BBQ Grill', '- Flex in our State of the Art Gym open 24/7', '- Heart-Stopping Views of DTLA', '- Subterranean Parking Garage', '- Controlled Access Community', '- Splash with Friends in the Pool', '- Pet Friendly', '- Common Area WiFi', '- Connect in the Business Center and Conference Room', 'Pet Policy', '$50 per month and $500 deposit.', 'Restriction on aggressive animals.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Topaz', '550 S.
